翇翇翇

翇字的基本解释

翇
fú
古代祭祀时跳舞人手中所拿的用羽毛做的舞具。

翇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》分勿切，入物，非。］
古舞名。舞者执全羽或五彩缯。

翇字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翇； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页956第04
【廣韻】【韻會】分勿切【集韻】分物切【正韻】敷勿切，?音紱。【說文】樂舞，執全羽以祀社稷也。【廣韻】周禮作帗。　又【集韻】蒲蓋切，音斾。義同。

翇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
翇字的起名意思

暂无。

Yu
Basic explanation of words
Yu
fú
Dance equipment made of feathers held in the hands of dancers in ancient sacrifices.
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" is divided into do not cut, into things, not. ]
Ancient dance name. The dancers hold full feathers or multicolored ribbons.
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [The Department of Yu Zi] 　翇; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: Page 956 04
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Do not cut separately [Jiyun] Do not cut objects separately [Zheng Yun] Do not cut when applied,? Sound enamel. [Said Wen] Music and dance, holding all feathers to worship the community. [Guang Yun] Zhou Li Zuo.　[Jiyun] Pu Gaiqie, Yinmo. The same meaning.
